reviewText:
The video quality of this product is an insult to the intelligence of customers, an absolute joke by these manufacturers-crooks who put the bad products. Not only is not in high definition (such as blue ray should be) but the images were probably stolen without permission from you tube, at a lower resolution of PAL, with entirely discolored.
There is no autoring or a 'menu, you can not even choose one of the 17 clips, but you are forced to use the fast forward function, such as a VHS. Well ... incomprehensible that Amazon can accept this type of product. I demand the restitution and compensation.
